name: engadget - late 09 ad fix
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document 
  domain("engadget.com")
{

#adDiv,
#searchsubmit,
#adsDiv1,
#adsDiv0,
#topstories,
.archives_heading,
.about_button,
.col2_kirf,
.col2_game_changer,
.col2_stats,
.skyscraper,
#tipus_tab,
#hero_35,
#hero_38,
#cobrand_hdr,
#outerslice,
.topLeader,
.linkarea,
.footer,
#slTop,
.inpostad,
#slMiddle,
#gallery_ads,
.footer_copy,
#topic-hub-sponsor,
.engadget_hdr_classic,
.engadget_hdr_mobile,
.engadget_hdr_hd,
.sphere,
.my-little-hero,
.related_articles,
.col2,
.post_select_arrows,
#GH_

{ display: none !important; }

.home { margin-top: 30px !important; margin-bottom: 36px !important; }

.col2_archives { margin-top: -32px !important; }

.searchform{  width: 294px !important; }

ul.pagination li.older { float: right !important; }

ul.pagination li.newer { float: left !important; }

.col1 {width:auto !important;}

.post_footer, .post_divider {width:100% !important;}

.article_gallery { margin-left: auto !important; margin-right: auto !important }

.engadget_hdr_search { float: right !important; margin-top:-11px !important; }

.post_body > img,
.post_body > a > img,
.post_body > div > img, 
.post_body > div > a > img { max-height: 120px; float: right}

}
